thread.title: victoria tissington-conway
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by victoria tissington-conway

author: victoria tissington-conway
title: victoria tissington-conway
text: We tried to get the mattress we bought 3 times from different shops and every time we were disappointed. 1 wasn't in stock, 1 was twice the price and 1 was delivered but was the wrong item. We finally received the right item, on time and at the right price. Thank you!!!
